MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L24 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Upton Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.17PM. Our emergency response team is currently on site carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.34PM on 25th February 2021.
